title: 80/189. Report of the Human Rights Council
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/80/189 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
19 December 2025 
25-20887 (E) 
*2520887* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 66 
Report of the Human Rights Council 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 15 December 2025 
 
 
[on the report of the Third Committee (A/80/545, para. 5)] 
 
 
 80/189. Report of the Human Rights Council 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Recalling its resolutions 60/251 of 15 March 2006, by which it established the 
Human Rights Council, and 65/281 of 17 June 2011 on the review of the Council, 
 
Recalling also its resolutions 62/219 of 22 December 2007, 63/160 of 
18 December 2008, 64/143 of 18 December 2009, 65/195 of 21 December 2010, 
66/136 of 19 December 2011, 67/151 of 20 December 2012, 68/144 of 18 December 
2013, 69/155 of 18 December 2014, 70/136 of 17 December 2015, 71/174 of 
19 December 2016, 72/153 of 19 December 2017, 73/152 of 17 December 2018, 
74/132 of 18 December 2019, 75/165 of 16 December 2020, 76/145 of 16 December 
2021, 77/200 of 15 December 2022, 78/186 of 19 December 2023 and 79/157 of 
17 December 2024, 
 
Recalling further its resolution 79/192 of 17 December 2024 on working 
methods of the Third Committee, 
 
Having considered the recommendations contained in the report of the Human 
Rights Council,1 
 
Takes note of the report of the Human Rights Council, including the addendum 
thereto, and its recommendations. 
 
62nd plenary meeting 
15 December 2025 
 
_______________ 
 
1 Official Records of the General Assembly, Eightieth Session, Supplement No. 53 (A/80/53); and 
ibid., Supplement No. 53A (A/80/53/Add.1).
